name: SAIT India
overview:
SAIT India is owned by a team of software techies who have worked for several years in Many US and India based IT firms and other core industries people. We at SAIT India, deliver sustainable web design, software development & enterprise solutions of any complexity to our clients worldwide.

Our deep focus towards our vision for becoming partners with client organizations, enable us to continuously add value to our clients throughout our engagement cycle. We feel that a true partner must be fully focused on its clients so as to understand their business needs and assist them in maximizing their Return on Investment (ROI). To ensure that we never lose focus on our clients, our strategy is to focus on a select set of prestigious firms, allowing us to be highly responsive to our client needs.
